verses.verse: הללו <WH1984> Praise יה <WH3050> ye the LORD. הללו <WH1984> Praise אל <WH410> God בקדשׁו <WH6944> in his sanctuary: הללוהו <WH1984> praise ברקיע <WH7549> him in the firmament עזו׃ <WH5797> of his power.
הללוהו <WH1984> Praise בגבורתיו <WH1369> him for his mighty acts: הללוהו <WH1984> praise כרב <WH7230> him according to his excellent גדלו׃ <WH1433> greatness.
הללוהו <WH1984> Praise בתקע <WH8629> him with the sound שׁופר <WH7782> of the trumpet: הללוהו <WH1984> praise בנבל <WH5035> him with the psaltery וכנור׃ <WH3658> and harp.
הללוהו <WH1984> Praise בתף <WH8596> him with the timbrel ומחול <WH4234> and dance: הללוהו <WH1984> praise במנים <WH4482> him with stringed instruments ועוגב׃ <WH5748> and organs.
הללוהו <WH1984> Praise בצלצלי <WH6767> cymbals: שׁמע <WH8088> him upon the loud הללוהו <WH1984> praise בצלצלי <WH6767> cymbals. תרועה׃ <WH8643> him upon the high sounding
כל <WH3605> Let every הנשׁמה <WH5397> thing that hath breath תהלל <WH1984> praise יה <WH3050> the LORD. הללו <WH1984> Praise יה׃ <WH3050> ye the LORD.
